body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting AutoPro Solutions. My name is Alexander Thompson, how may I assist you today? May I have your name please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great to meet you, Debra. Could you please provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five, two zero one, three four six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Debra. Can I also have your email address for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email is debra.wood@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect, thank you for sharing your details, Debra. I'll make sure to update our system accordingly.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Is there anything else I can assist you with today or any more information you'd like to provide?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. I feel relieved that everything is in order. Thank you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Debra. If you have any more questions in the future, feel free to reach out. Thank you for your time. Have a great day!
